content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position (43.0, -82.0)) that is currently working and processing iron ore into iron plates.
  
### Stone Furnace at position (45.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace (position (45.0, -82.0)) that is currently idle due to lack of ingredients to smelt.

### Burner Mining Drill at position (40.0, -84.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill (position (40.0, -84.0)) that is currently working and extracting resources.

### Wooden Chest at position (39.5, -85.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Wooden Chest (position (39.5, -85.5)) that is currently holding coal.

### Copper Plate Mine at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Burner mining drill (position x2) and a furnace at position(y2)
- Burner mining drill (position x3) and a furnace at position(y3)

### Copper Cable Factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x1) and a furnace at position(y1)
- Assembling machine at position(z1) and inserter at position(a) that puts into assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position) that connects the furnace at position y1 to assembling machine at position(z1)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when inserting into the Stone Furnace without ingredients
- Ensure that there are sufficient ingredients in your inventory before attempting to insert them into the Stone Furnace. Check your inventory for iron ore before insertion.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing. Check the status of the tile to confirm it is not occupied.

### Errors when the Stone Furnace has no ingredients to smelt
- Regularly check the inventory of the Stone Furnace and ensure that it has the necessary ingredients to operate. If it is idle, gather the required materials.
